projects.name: Academic Genealogy Website
projects.description: A Django-based web application for UC Davis Computer Science, allowing users to view and manage their academic genealogy within the department. The project includes a user-friendly interface (Bootstrap UI), JSON files integration, and scalable infrastructure.

projects.name: Rivalry Clash
projects.description: A Real Time Strategy game built using Unity. The project is designed to be played on desktop, coming soon to mobile. The game features a user-friendly interface, and is designed to be scalable for future updates.

projects.name: Pirates in Peril
projects.description: A 2D platformer game built using Unity. The project is designed to be played on desktop, and features a user-friendly interface, and is designed to be with multiple players. The game is my first game project, aiming to learn the basics of Unity and game development.

projects.name: Prosecutor
projects.description: PROSECUTOR is a isometric investigative game where players take on the role of a prosecutor, gathering evidence and interviewing witnesses to build a case against a suspect. The game is still in development pitch, and is designed to be played on desktop.
